title: Museo in use
content:
Hugo Roussel from [STUDIO PUNKAT](http://web.archive.org/web/20120727021918/http:/www.punkat.com/) e-mailed me an example of [Museo](http://web.archive.org/web/20120727021918/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/museo.html) in use.  
I think it's great!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120727021918im_/http:/typophile.com/files/museo_hugo_1_3847.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120727021918im_/http:/typophile.com/files/museo_hugo_2_5067.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120727021918im_/http:/typophile.com/files/museo_hugo_3_6649.jpg)
author: Jos Buivenga

comments.content: See also [Marco Campedelli’s poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20120727021918/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/marcocampedelli/2589789947/) set in Museo.

Thanks Antonio. I've added it to my faves. Here's another [nice one](http://web.archive.org/web/20120727021918/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/kevinpistone/2467082867/) I saw on Flickr, done by Kevin Pistone.
